content.text: How do I integrate AI into my React Native app?
You can use OpenAI‚Äôs API or on-device models like Mistral AI. Would you like a guide on setting up AI-powered chatbots or voice assistants?
Is on-device AI better than cloud AI?
On-device AI reduces latency and improves privacy, but cloud AI offers more computing power. It depends on your use case. Want help deciding which is best for your app?
How do I secure AI models in my app?
Use ENCRYPTION for API keys, limit user data exposure, and prefer on-device processing where possible. Want a security checklist for AI implementation?
